latestInspection.result: Inspection Result:     Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to maintain required staff to child supervision ratios at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hallways and other means of egress were observed obstructed and impassable
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service not free of pests or maintains pest harborage conditions at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take any and all necessary action to eliminate potential hazards
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Exits and other egress not provided with required signage at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children

At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take appropriate action to keep facility free of pests or conditions conducive to pests Child care service fails to maintain extermination service log
